title: Cat Magic Is Going To Revolutionize The World, Right? ~If I'm Going To Be Called Inferior, I'm Going To Revenge Myself With Beast Magic!~
alternative_title: 猫魔法が世界に革命を起こすそうですよ？～劣等種なんて言われるのならケモノ魔法でリベンジします！～ ; Neko Mahō ga Sekai ni Kakumei Ookosu, Sōdesu yo? ~Rettō-shu Nante Iwareru no Nara Kemono Mahō de Ribenji Shimasu!~ ; Neko Mahou ga Sekai ni Kakumei Ookosu, Soudesu yo? ~Rettou-shu Nante Iwareru no Nara Kemono Mahou de Ribenji Shimasu!~
status: 猫魔法が世界に革命を起こすそうですよ？～劣等種なんて言われるのならケモノ魔法でリベンジします！～ ; Neko Mahō ga Sekai ni Kakumei Ookosu, Sōdesu yo? ~Rettō-shu Nante Iwareru no Nara Kemono Mahō de Ribenji Shimasu!~ ; Neko Mahou ga Sekai ni Kakumei Ookosu, Soudesu yo? ~Rettou-shu Nante Iwareru no Nara Kemono Mahou de Ribenji Shimasu!~
description:
Description :
        ***Cuteness explosion! Overturn the common sense of the world with cat power!***Court magician Angelica (catgirl) is suddenly forced out of her job one day. In this world where the common sense that beastkin are "inferior species" who can't use magic, she was said to be a liar because she manipulates original cat magic. However, Angelica, a former S-Class adventurer, is undeterred. She reluctantly accepts Laika, a doggirl who was forced out of the magic academy, as her apprentice, and this time she begins her ideal life as an adventurer! Two beastkins—cat and dog girl achieve a magical revolution!? A slapstick ✖ messy adventure fantasy! (MTL)

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 2.1: The Sage Takes An Apprentice (First Half)
